info.title: Turnip
info.author: Conanac
info.details:
This is a simple application for reading and changing turnip prices stored in animal crossing city folk gamesave file and a derived game for transforming turnips to bags of bells.

Usage: Extract the gamesave file using Waninkoko's Savegame Extractor, then run this application. This application produces TURNIP.TXT file, and if there is no setting/input file (turnipsetting.xml), it will be created automatically, otherwise it will be used for setting directories/files and target prices

Controls: 
Wiimote D-pad: DOWN advances screen one page, UP returns to start of TURNIP.TXT file stored in SD root directory (or other location defined in the setting/input file).
Wiimote 1 or 2: A combination of four pushed buttons to transform turnips at the bottom of the screen to bags of bells.
Wiimote A: Submit the first four pushed buttons (1 or 2 buttons) after the clear or start/restart; Confirm selection after submitting request for updating/changing prices.
Wiimote B: Clear or restart for the new combination.
Wiimote Home: Return or exit to Homebrew Channel; Cancel selection in submitting request for updating/changing prices and then exit to Homebrew Channel.

Credits:
TxtEd/TxtEd Mod coders (Linus and Freigeist), their application is used as the base of this application.
